title: Glaucoma Detection AI
desc: AI system for early glaucoma detection using UNet and YOLOv9. Designed for fast, lightweight screening in clinical environments. [Private Repo]

title: Smart Email Assistant
desc: LLM-powered assistant that fetches and summarizes Gmail inboxes, then sends key alerts via WhatsApp using Twilio. [Private Repo]

title: Housing Price Prediction (Big Data)
desc: Built with PySpark to analyze housing data and predict prices. Includes ML modeling, visualization, and real-time predictions via Flask.

title: Sign Language Recognition
desc: Real-time interpreter for 36 alphanumeric hand gestures using webcam and Graph Convolutional Networks. Freelance project.

title: Bookstore Inventory App
desc: End-to-end MERN stack app to manage books, inventory, orders, and user roles with full CRUD functionality.

title: Movie Recommendation System
desc: ML-powered recommender with dual models: one using static datasets and the other fetching real-time data via TMDB API.

title: Web Scraping Automation Tool
desc: Flexible Python scraper to extract data from structured websites. Used for job listings, product info, and news.

title: Rhyme Calendar Flow (Experimental)
desc: React-based AI calendar assistant experiment using Loable AI for rhyme generation and event narration.

title: Anime Series Front-End Page
desc: Single-page responsive website built with Bootstrap. Features anime info, watch links, questions, and merch buy options.

title: Interactive Portfolio with RAG Chatbot
desc: This very portfolio features a LangChain-powered chatbot that answers questions about my skills and projects using Groq + HuggingFace APIs.
